post.date: Posted: Fri Feb 17, 2006 12:36 pm Post subject: lw ase exporter?
post.author: Xtreme
post.body:
Sup....

is there a ase exporter for lightwave?

thanks!!

post.date: Posted: Fri Feb 17, 2006 12:40 pm Post subject:
post.author: Kristus
post.body:
uhm. Doom3 supports lwo files. Which I believe is Lightwave's own format.
_________________
D3: Phobos
http://www.doomworld.com/phobos

"About the hardest part of my job is to connect Iraq, to the war on terror." - George Bush

post.date: Posted: Fri Feb 17, 2006 2:30 pm Post subject:
post.author: Rayne
post.body:
It's built-in in version 8.0 (maybe even in 7.5)
_________________
theRev is coming...

post.author: Xtreme
post.body:
thanks for your replys...

i have lw 8 and cant find the ase export plugin!! scanned the plugin directory and got alot plugins but no ase export plugin
;( hehe

thanks again for replying
